data.name: Weakpoint Delta
data.detailed_description:
Use the skills of timing, triangulation and precision, that you totally have, to mine asteroids and collect the crystals within. Use said crystals to get upgrades to make it easier to mine and the equipment needed to mine new, dangerous, but valuable asteroids. All while trying to pay off your crippling debt.


(Music in the trailers: "cdk - Sunday" by Analog By Nature and "Kalte Ohren (septahelix remix)" by septahelix)
data.about_the_game:
Use the skills of timing, triangulation and precision, that you totally have, to mine asteroids and collect the crystals within. Use said crystals to get upgrades to make it easier to mine and the equipment needed to mine new, dangerous, but valuable asteroids. All while trying to pay off your crippling debt.


(Music in the trailers: "cdk - Sunday" by Analog By Nature and "Kalte Ohren (septahelix remix)" by septahelix)
data.short_description: Asteroids go boom. Zoom around in your lil' ship and learn how to accurately hit weakpoints on asteroids to extract the precious crystals within allowing you to purchase upgrades.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10, probably
  • Processor: Preferably, yes
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: If not, my hours of excrutiating graphical design would be wasted :(
  • Storage: 1000 MB available space
  • Sound Card: If you wanna have sound, then yeah
  • Additional Notes: Should run on a potato? It's a 2d indie game, it's not like it's demanding.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel i5-4460 3.2 GHz
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVidia gtx 970
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: The recommended requirements are based on my own pc on which the game runs flawlessly
